com.example.carbon_counter_front_end.data.logic

Class MainActivityLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.carbon_counter_front_end.data.logic.MainActivityLogic

  • public class MainActivityLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Logic class to take care of the logic for MainActivity.
    Author:
    Zachary Current

      • MainActivityLogic

                         android.content.Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • setModel

        public void setModel(RequestServerForService m)
        Set mainActivityLogic's model to take care of server contact
        Parameters:
        m - model to be set of class RequestServerForService

      • getNews

        public void getNews()
        Method to contact server to get all of the news items on the database OnSuccess will call setMyNews(response)

      • setMyNews

        public void setMyNews(org.json.JSONArray response)
        After successful getNews(), the response is sent back to this logic class. The response is then added to a list to be accessed by mainActivity
        Parameters:
        response - response from server containing news items, if any

      • getNewsIndex

        public int getNewsIndex()
        Returns news Index, used for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        newsIndex

      • addNews

        public void addNews(org.json.JSONObject news)
        Adds a news object to logic's myNews list. Has no effect on server. Used for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        news - news to be added

      • setNextImage

        public void setNextImage()
        When next button is pressed. Handles newsIndex and calls getImage() - which contacts the server for the current news object on sends the image back on a successful connection.

      • setPrevImage

        public void setPrevImage()
        When prev button is pressed. Handles newsIndex and calls getImage() - which contacts the server for the current news object on sends the image back on a successful connection.

      • getUri

        public android.net.Uri getUri()
        Called when go is pressed, generates URI for the link of the current news object.
        Returns:
        URI for current news object

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns title of news object at newsIndex
        Returns:
        title of current news object

      • Permissions

        public boolean Permissions(java.lang.String role)
